name: Nordic Beauty™ Pine Bark Extract
description:
NORDIC BEAUTY PINE BARK EXTRACT is made of the bark and the phloem of young pines. The extraction process is carried out according to traditional folklore, in addition to which information gained from tests made at different universities has also been taken into consideration.

Nordic Beauty Pine Bark extract contains different fenolic com- pounds, mainly resveratrol and catechins, around 500 μg/ml in total. It can be considered an efficient antioxidant as it showed 95% inhibition of ex vivo low-density lipo- protein (LDL) oxidation.
